description: Detects usage of Gpg4win to decrypt files
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: File Decryption Using Gpg4win
query: (event.category:process AND ((process.executable:(/.*\\[Gg][Pp][Gg]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR /.*\\[Gg][Pp][Gg]2\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/)) OR (winlog.event_data.Description:/[Gg][Nn][Uu][Pp][Gg]’[Ss]\ [Oo][Pp][Ee][Nn][Pp][Gg][Pp]\ [Tt][Oo][Oo][Ll]/)) AND (process.command_line:/.*\ \-[Dd]\ .*/ AND process.command_line.text:*passphrase*))
